which is studied in `data.real.pi.wallis` and other places. -/

        (real.pi / 2) (cos x ^ n) =
      1 / 2 *
        «expr∫ in .. , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∫ in .. , »" 0
          (real.pi) (sin x ^ n) :=
  by
  rw [mul_comm (1 / 2 : exprℝ), ← div_eq_iff (one_div_ne_zero (two_ne_zero' (exprℝ))), ← div_mul, div_one, mul_two]
  have L : interval_integrable _ volume 0 (real.pi / 2) := (continuous_sin.pow n).interval_integrable _ _
  have R : interval_integrable _ volume (real.pi / 2) (real.pi) := (continuous_sin.pow n).interval_integrable _ _
  rw [← integral_add_adjacent_intervals L R]
  congr 1
  · nth_rw 1 [(by ring : 0 = real.pi / 2 - real.pi / 2)]
    nth_rw 3 [(by ring : real.pi / 2 = real.pi / 2 - 0)]
    rw [← integral_comp_sub_left]
    refine' integral_congr fun x _ => _
    dsimp only
    rw [cos_pi_div_two_sub]
  · nth_rw 3 [(by ring : real.pi = real.pi / 2 + real.pi / 2)]
    nth_rw 2 [(by ring : real.pi / 2 = 0 + real.pi / 2)]
    rw [← integral_comp_add_right]
    refine' integral_congr fun x _ => _
    dsimp only
    rw [sin_add_pi_div_two]
#align integral_cos_pow_eq integral_cos_pow_eq

theorem antideriv_sin_comp_const_mul (hz : z ≠ 0) (x : exprℝ) :
